name: Map
description: A detailed chart or map, representing guidance, navigation, and the knowledge needed to find one's way.

person: A guide or navigator who knows the way forward
Someone who provides misleading directions or false information
creatureTrap: Creatures that can track or navigate expertly through terrain
Illusory or shape-shifting creatures that lead travelers astray
place: A location that serves as a crossroads or navigation point
A confusing maze or area where normal navigation fails
treasure: Charts, maps, or navigational tools of great value
False maps or misleading documents that lead to danger
situation: Clear direction and guidance toward achieving goals
Confusion about which path to take or being lost
